title: St. Mary's Orthodox Cathedral, Dadar, Mumbai
summary: St. Mary's Orthodox Cathedral is the first Parish of the Mumbai Orthodox Diocese of the Malankara Orthodox Syrian Church in Mumbai.
content:
St. Mary's Orthodox Cathedral is the first Parish of the Mumbai Orthodox Diocese of the Malankara Orthodox Syrian Church in Mumbai.


== History ==


== Church Services ==
HOLY QURBANA Sunday : 07.00 AM (1st service) 09.30 AM (2nd service) (2nd Sunday of every month 2nd service in English at 08:30 AM)
On Obligatory days: 07.00 AM INTERCESSORY PRAYER
Tuesday: 06.30 PM Evening Prayer & Intercessory Prayer to St. Mary
Friday: 05.30 PM Evening Prayer, Holy Qurbana and Intercessory Prayer to Parumala Mar Gregorios.
